    • fromUri

      @NonNull public static BipDerivationPath fromUri(@NonNull Uri bipUri)
      Factory method to convert WalletContractV1.BIP32_URI_SCHEME and WalletContractV1.BIP44_URI_SCHEME Uris into BipDerivationPaths
      Parameters:
      bipUri - a Uri encoding either a WalletContractV1.BIP32_URI_SCHEME or a WalletContractV1.BIP44_URI_SCHEME Uri
      Returns:
      a BipDerivationPath
